conclusion: Car A is positioned at the lower right, moving towards the group of blocks scattered randomly on a green surface.

The image shows a green surface with blocks of various colors (yellow, orange, green, red, blue, and purple) scattered randomly. Car A is positioned at the lower right corner, moving towards the blocks.
Car A moves towards the group of blocks.
Car A collides with the green block located near the red block.
The collision causes the green block to be pushed forward.
After the collision, Car A loses some momentum but continues to move slightly forward.
Car A comes to a stop near the orange block due to the reduction in speed after the collision.
The green block is displaced but remains within the cluster of blocks.
Car A will collide with the green block and then come to a stop near the orange block. The collision with the green block causes it to move, while Car A loses momentum and stops.
